dev/lsf/util/random.hpp

00001 // File:        random.hpp
00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      leoxiang <leoxiang727@qq.com>
00005 // Revision:    2012-08-09 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <set>
00010 #include <cstdlib>
00011 #include <sys/time.h>
00012 #include "lsf/basic/error.hpp"
00013 #include "lsf/basic/singleton.hpp"
00014 
00015 namespace lsf {
00016 namespace util {
00017 
00018 class Random : public lsf::basic::Error {
00019 public:
00020     static const size_t MAX_RANDOM_COUNT = 10000;
00021 
00022 public:
00023     Random(size_t max_cnt = MAX_RANDOM_COUNT) : _max_cnt(max_cnt) { InitSeed(); }
00024 
00025     void InitSeed() {
00026         timeval tv;
00027         ::gettimeofday(&tv, nullptr);
00028         ::srand(tv.tv_usec);
00029         _use_cnt = 0;
00030     }
00031 
00032     // generate random between [0, end]
00033     uint32_t GetRand(uint32_t end) { return GetRand(0, end); }
00034 
00035     // generate random between [start, end]
00036     uint32_t GetRand(uint32_t start, uint32_t end) {
00037         if (end <= start) return start;
00038 
00039         uint32_t off = end - start + 1;
00040         uint64_t random;
00041 
00042         if (_use_cnt > _max_cnt) InitSeed();
00043 
00044         if (off < 0xfff) {
00045             random = ::rand();
00046             _use_cnt++;
00047         } else if (off < 0xfffff) {
00048             random = (::rand() & 0xfff) | ((::rand() & 0xfff) << 24);
00049             _use_cnt++;
00050         } else {
00051             random = (::rand() & 0xfff) | ((::rand() & 0xfff) << 24) | ((uint64_t)(::rand() & 0xfff) << 48);
00052             _use_cnt++;
00053         }
00054 
00055         return start + random % off;
00056     }
00057 
00058     // generate random within set container
00059     template<typename ElemType>
00060     ElemType GetRand(std::set<ElemType> const& container) {
00061         ElemType rand = GetRand(*container.begin(), *container.rbegin());
00062         if (container.find(rand) != container.end()) {
00063             return rand;
00064         }
00065         else if (container.lower_bound(rand) != container.end()) {
00066             return *container.lower_bound(rand);
00067         }
00068         else if (container.upper_bound(rand) != container.end()) {
00069             return *container.upper_bound(rand);
00070         }
00071         else {
00072             return ElemType();
00073         }
00074     }
00075 
00076     // accessor
00077     void SetMaxCount(size_t max_cnt) { _max_cnt = max_cnt; }
00078 
00079     size_t GetUseCount() const { return _use_cnt; }
00080 
00081 private:
00082     size_t _max_cnt = 0;
00083     size_t _use_cnt = 0;
00084 };
00085 
00087 // Singleton Random
00088 class SingleRandom : public Random, public lsf::basic::Singleton<Random> {
00089 };
00090 
00091 }  // end of namespace util
00092 }  // end of namespace lsf
00093
